document_data.caption: A map of northwest Eltabbar showing the Temple of Cyric.
document_data.name: Temple of Cyric
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Cyric''' was a [[temple]] dedicated to [[Cyric]], the Prince of Lies, in the city of [[Eltabbar]] in [[Thay]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4101 Eltabbar}}
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the northwest section of the city along the banks of the [[River Eltar]] where it entered Eltabbar. The [[Temple of Loviatar (Eltabbar)|Temple of Loviatar]] stood to its south along the river.
